news.title: Jobs in Legal Services Sector Increase For Third Straight Month
news.description: Continuing a general upward trend that began in December, the legal industry posted a slight gain in July that represented an increase of 2,400 jobs since a year ago at this time.

news.title: ‘Caste System’ at Some Law Firms Won’t Survive, Consultant Says; Multidisciplinary Teams Will
news.description: According to an industry insider, law firms may soon face economic pressure to employ multidisciplinary teams of lawyers and non-lawyers instead of a hierarchical mentality.

news.title: The Most Effective Tech Tools for Lawyers? New Survey Says They Ain’t What You Think
news.description: Though Blockchain and AI have garnered much attention, new data show that the most important tech tools for lawyers relate to document management, billing, and time keeping.

news.title: ABA Has Seen Improvement in Key Areas After Launch of New Membership Model, Executive Director Says
news.description: In the wake of changes such as introducing a new dues structure, a new CLE Marketplace, and an ABA Career Center, the organization reports strong performance in important areas.
